titleInfo.title: Recovering the U.S. Hispanic literary heritage

mods.note: Vol. 2: Edited by Erlinda Gonzales-Berry and Chuck Tatum./ Vol. 3: Edited by María Herrera-sobek and Virginia Sánchez Korrol./ Vol. 4: Edited by José F. Aranada, Jr. and Silvio Torres-Saillant./ Vol. 5: Edited by Kenya Dworkin y Méndez and Agnes Lugo-Ortiz./ Vol. 6: Edited by Antonia I. Castañeda and A. Gabriel Meléndez./ Vol. 7: Edited by Gerald E. Poyo and Tomás Ybarra-Frausto./ Includes bibliographical references./ Also issued online.
